game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, players take on the role of a Chronos Guardian tasked with repairing the fabric of reality. The journey begins in the city of Aeterna, where the last remnants of humanity cling to existence amidst the chaos of fractured timelines. As the protagonist delves deeper into the mystery, they will encounter ancient artifacts, rival time travelers, and echoes of civilizations past, all vying for control over the destiny of the universe.
game.beginning: The game starts with the player's character experiencing a catastrophic event known as 'The Great Dissonance,' which shatters the timeline and plunges Aeterna into chaos. The player must navigate the treacherous landscape to reach the fabled Timekeeper's Tower, where they will discover their role as a Chronos Guardian.
game.ending: Depending on the player's choices throughout the game, one of three endings unfolds: 'Temporal Utopia,' where the timeline is restored and humanity flourishes; 'Echoes of Destruction,' where the fabric of reality collapses and Aeterna succumbs to eternal chaos; or 'Aeternal Stasis,' where time freezes forever, and the player must find a new path forward.
